description:
Charlie Parr describes a special guitar given to him by Spider John Koerner
Support The Current: https://support.mpr.org/youtube  

Singer-songwriter @TheCharlieParr talks about the 12-string Gretsch Guitar given to him by his role model, inspiration and friend, the late Spider John Koerner.

Parr used the guitar in a studio session to play the song "Ten Watt," off his 2024 album, "Little Sun," available on ‪@SmithsonianFolkways.

@gretschguitars 

#acoustic #acousticguitar
title: Charlie Parr describes a guitar given to him by Spider John Koerner #guitar #shorts #interview
